post.body: I appreciate the sympathy. I think they lost cuz I didn't have my towel with me!
got the card! Awesome thank you!
just dedicated a song to @JillBarbour cause her mom is a bee keeper.
that would be Emery!
praise Jesus. Now I'll start praying for @tonymorganlive.
I am proud. Watch, now the haters will come out. But then I think you're used to them.
shut up elrod...don't you have some foghat to listen to??
let me know if it's any good. I'm planning to go out around 10am.
Just spent the last 2 hours trying to get a fire started. The wood was wet. I still managed to roast a few marshmellows.
Dog just threw up...dog just cleaned it up. Good dog.
Congrats to @taddgrandstaff & @garylamb on kicking the devil in the face.
Great day at Lifepoint! Now I'm watching the steelers game at bw3.
Good times tonight with @mkapusta, @halgriffin, Jen (who is soon to twitter), @chadking, @rebekahking, @bradbarbour, and @JillBarbour.
It's been a chill Saturday. Hiking. Friends. Halo. Now it's time for dinner.
If you're in Wilmington how bout joining me at the connection cafe for some Naska and king music??
I take that back...2 ladies are about to die laughing.
my son just made a very loud farting sound with his arm...in the coffee shop. Nobody was fazed.
Caught some awesome waves with @halgriffin, Jen (who needs to start twittering) and even @mkapusta!!! It was awesome!
A lady told me she hasn't been to church in a while b/c she has been blessed with lots of tix to panthers games! Pardon me while I vomit.
Gonna run to deliver some more gifts to some neighbors.
